question: Which of the following was defeated by the East India Company in the Third Anglo– Maratha War in 1818 A.D.?
explanation: Baji Rao II was defeated by the East India Company in the Third Anglo– Maratha War which happened in 1818 A.D. After this was Peshwa’s territory in central Maharashtra was annexed to the British East India Company’s Bombay province and Baji Rao II was pensioned off.
